question: Alex has 40 square yards of grapes field. There are 42 grapess per square yard. Alex can harvest his grapess every 1 months. How many grapess can Alex harvest within a year?
answer:
Alex has 42*40= <<42*40=1680>>1680 grapess on his field.
Alex can harvest his grapess 12 / 1 = <<12/1=12>>12 times per year
Therefore Alex can harvest 1680*12 = <<1680*12=20,160>>20,160 grapess per year.
#### 20,160
